title: Album Page, "Cloister of Saint Lorenzo, Florence", November 13, 1887
medium: Graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, top right corner: (inscribed in circle) 85 / 98. Clockwise from top left corner: cap; elevation; Cloister San Lorenzo / Florence November 13th 1887; The capitals although all / Ionic are different in / detail. / This is the cloister in / which the cats are kept / and fed - The view fom / the 2nd story is very / beautiful; 1st story; section; 2nd story.
description: Vertical sheet with sketches of architectural elements.  At left is a section of a buliding, with round arch ceiling below and slanted roof above.  At top left is a detail of an Ionic capital supporting a beam.  At right an elevation of a colonnade in the Ionic style supporting a tiled roof.  Below this is an elevation of an arcade in the Ionic style.  It is possible that these sketches are elevations of the first and second stories of the building shown in section at left.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Cloister of Saint Lorenzo, Florence", November 13, 1887. Graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-155.
